product_context.title: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: Device works great. Good warranty. Newer Jasco aka GE Embrighten aka UltraPro (all the same, Ultrapro is simple packaging and cheaper priced but same hardware) in white do not match the older ones. The New models have bluer paddles, don't match old ones. Older ones matched faceplate from Leviton at Home Depot. See picture. New one on the right. If you have old, dead devices, you can salvage their paddles to make them match. But note the pull plug under the paddle of dimmers and switches is longer in the new model, so you'll have to use that bluer pull pin with your older, color matched paddle.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2025
reviews.title: Newer Jasco aka GE Embrighten aka UltraPro in white do not match the older ones

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: Use these by majority over off/on ones.

reviews.title: Work Great

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: They work great and connect to alarm system for scene control. However, only 3 out of 8 devices in 4 years are still working. 2 died in the first year. I gave it 5 stars for it's compatibility and usability and subtracted 3 for the unreliability.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2024
reviews.title: Beware short lifespan

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: this worked fine with everything except leds. after 3 years it started blinking blue, and never worked again.

reviews.title: works for 3 years

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: the buttons on this switch are stupidly hard to press. requires a much firmer push than any of the other enbrighten/GE/jasco switches i have throughout the rest of the house. this results in having to press the switch multiple times to get it to work, since the first time usually isn't hard enough. seriously, it's ridiculous how different the button feel is from any of the other swiches.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2024
reviews.title: buttons are stupidly hard to press

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: Bought and I stalled the switch at the end of June 2024. It's now Sep 23rd, and the switch worked fine last night, and today it's dead. No longer working. The blue indicator light goes on and off to indicate that the switch is cycling, but the lights don't come on. This is the second time this has happened with one of these switches. Of course, I'm past the return/customer support window. So, buyer beware!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024
reviews.title: Great switch, till it stops working

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: I wired this up according to the instructions given for a multi-way setup. Firstly, these do not support secure inclusion in Home Assistant, but after understanding that, I went ahead with the configuration. Firstly I put the switch in standard mode since I have dumb switches in the circuit. After that, I tried operating the switch from the z-wave switch, and although the status changed, the switch did not turn on the lights. I then went to one of the dumb switches, and again the status changed, but the light did not turn on. The seem to only work well either in a single pole setup or with the companion switch which is not the ideal setup for me, so I am going to try other options. As an aside; the fixture I was trying to operate was only 90W, but when I moved this to a single light, it worked fine.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2024
reviews.title: Would not operate a Chandelier

reviews.productTitle: Enbrighten Z-Wave Light Dimmer with QuickFit & SimpleWire, 3-Way Ready, Works with Alexa, Google Assistant, Z Wave Hub Required, Repeater/Range Extender, Smart Switch, White & Almond, 700Series, 58438
reviews.text: I installed this in a shed about 60 ft from our house, so I can turn on the light remotely. The switch connects to the house Wi-Fi perfectly. Minus 1 star because the switch manual operation is a bit unusual. You press only the bottom half of the switch to turn the light both on and off.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2024
reviews.title: Good range
